binary-to-decimal_key2: In this program, if we are given any number in **binary form**, then we will learn to convert that number in **decimal form**.
binary-to-decimal_key4: To convert this number in `decimal form`:-
binary-to-decimal_key6: second last element ko 2^1 yaani 2 se
binary-to-decimal_key7: third last element ko 2^2 yaani 4 se
binary-to-decimal_key8: fourth last element ko 2^3 yaani 8 se
binary-to-decimal_key14: After doing the above steps, you will get **155** as an answer.
binary-to-decimal_key16: What will be the `output` of this program? If your progrsm is **robust** then it will give invalid `output`, otherwise it will throw an `error`.
binary-to-decimal_key18: But, if it will not be **robust**, then it will throw `error`.
